column3: utACK 9da936232743a2235dade998be7f01ce0cf1b709\n\nAlso consider in this PR moving the `if (fPruneMode)` code block up in the function so that it's immediately below the `pruned` line. That seems more logical and the return object would be ordered the same as the help text.
Done and done, tested latest commit, appears in correct order.
Suggest merging this with #11367 to avoid PR dependencies?
Update to `(only present if pruning is enabled)`. See [this example](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/791a0e6ddade27d1b69f4861a6640de60b9553cf/src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp#L1845) for reference.
Since this is touched, update as per developer notes? `{` in this line.
Remove first condition `block` and add `assert(block);` above.
